title: 7 signs that indicate that water is flowing in a dream, learn about them in detail

preview.html: Seeing running water in a dream, water is one of the important elements that the body constantly needs to complete its functions, and dreaming of running water in a dream carries many indicators, some of which may be interpreted as good and the rest may indicate evil that the dreamer encounters. In this article, we will explain the matter in detail in all the different cases. Seeing running water in a dream If the dreamer sees himself bathing with running water in a dream, this has many meanings, such as: possessing good moral qualities. Seeing running water in a dream and the dreamer walking on it is a sign. On his staying away from sins, his disobedience, and his closeness to the Creator, Glory be to Him. If the running water in the dream is not pure, this describes the bad mood that the dreamer is experiencing due to giving up a coin and losing many securities. Seeing running water in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing running water in a dream means That the person will live in prosperity and happiness and will not suffer from a lack of means of livelihood. Ibn Sirin explains that a person’s possession of running water means that he can obtain a high position in his work and obtain many things that will make him happy and live a good life. When a person sees a stream of water with impurities and cleans it, this It is good for him, because God Almighty will bless him with his health and life. If a person sees that he is cutting the water wheel through which the water flows, this indicates serious problems with his wife and this may lead to quarrels between them. Seeing running water in a single woman’s dreamIf a girl sees that she is drinking from a cylinder Water flows in it, this indicates her longevity and her feeling of peace and reassurance in her life. Seeing polluted water flowing in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she is feeling stressed at the present time because she cannot obtain her rights from the people around her. A single woman dreams of being given a cup of Running water for someone, this indicates her desire to own many things and her efforts to achieve the ambitions she wants to reach. When a girl sees in a dream that she is drinking from pure flowing water, this indicates that there is a well-born person who is presenting himself to her parents to ask for her hand in marriage and their marriage will happen soon. Seeing running water in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream drinking water is her good skin because the disputes she is suffering from will end and she will feel calm. A woman’s dream of her partner giving her a cup of running water in a dream indicates that she feels joyful and happy with him and she may hear happy news. , such as pregnancy in the next few days. The dreamer seeing that there is a long distance between her and the water in the dream means that she may be able to achieve everything she wants, but only after a lot of patience on her part. Seeing water flowing in a pregnant woman’s dream in the event that the pregnant woman sees water Running in a dream, this means that she will give birth to a beautiful, good child who will be righteous and help her in her life, and God Almighty will help her in childbirth and relieve her of her pain. Birth

title: I dreamed that I was traveling by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was traveling is one of the dreams that a person can visit, which makes him feel that he will travel soon, but the interpretation does not require that it refers to a trip, it can have a different meaning depending on the dream, you can dream that you are traveling with friends or that you are traveling to the country in which you reside and the circumstances Others that affect interpretation. I dreamed that I was traveling. I dreamed that I was traveling, is evidence that a person can change his condition from one country to another, where he can become a better person than he is at the moment. The dream of traveling also shows that people’s secrets are being revealed, so the dream shows That the dreamer can be shown the true morals and behavior of those around him. As for the dream of returning from a trip, it is often interpreted as the return of the sinner from the wrong path he was taking and his repentance to God Almighty. I dreamed that I was a traveler by Ibn Sirin. In general, Ibn Sirin sees in his dream that I am a traveler, The trip is evidence of a change in the fortuneteller’s condition, as his sorrows and pain may end and he may begin to live a happy life. If the travel in the dream is by riding an animal, then this is explained by Ibn Sirin by saying: The dreamer will reach the will of God Almighty, his desires and his dreams in this life. This indicates that the fortuneteller has lost his way and I have followed his desires, and here he must review himself and stop the mistakes he is making so that God may have mercy on him. I dreamed that I was traveling alone. I dreamed that I was traveling with an unmarried girl, is evidence of someone trying to approach her, while she is among her family and her family, so that she wishes to marry her. This marriage is blessed by God Almighty. New things about her. Sometimes scholars interpret the dream of traveling for an unmarried girl as an indication that this girl is tired of her traditional daily life and wants to get rid of everything, and here she should try to offer some things that are dear to her heart. Her day and the dream of traveling also symbolize the single woman as a person. She is strong and able to make her own decisions. She only needs to focus and think before starting any new path in her life. The dream of traveling may include a new suitcase, and this is evidence of the imminent marriage or engagement of a single girl and that she will live Beautiful days, God willing. The failure of the emotional relationship of this visionary, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was traveling for a married woman. The travel situations that a married woman can be exposed to during her sleep vary. For example, someone could say that I dreamed that I was traveling and during the trip, and here the dream will be an indication that there are a lot of The goodness and abundance of food that will come to the viewer in the coming days and the worries in her life lead to joy, contentment and happiness. However, if the dreamer is sad in the dream of traveling, this means that she is facing many problems in her life. I dreamed that I was traveling on foot for the sake of a married woman, and this is evidence of That she is facing some crises in her life, whether with her family or at work, and that she needs to learn patience and pray to God Almighty a lot to be able to do that. To get through this period in good condition, and because the stress of the trip in the dream is a sign of...

title: Interpretation of tayammum in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of tayammum: washing dirt in the sand, or an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, due to lack of water, and most of all Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of tayammum in a dream. Ja`far al-Sadiq said: Tayammum in a dream is the fulfillment of what is desired, which is healing, sustenance, Hajj, power, and freedom. Tayammum indicates In a dream, near one’s side. Tayammum is a sign of comfort in the proximity of God Almighty. Tayammum in a dream is evidence of travel or a warning of an illness that requires tayammum. Perhaps it indicates the loss of water for the traveler because he performs tayammum with sand or something that does not stick to the hands. Tayammum indicates poverty after wealth and ill health and well-being for the patient. Tayammum in the presence of water indicates a mistake. If he sees that he is performing tayammum, even if he is without water, then this indicates that he is almost weak, and the distress has passed. And if he is in the presence of water, then there are five sayings: Among them: That the dreamer prefers marriage to consummation. The second: That he is one who prefers traveling by land to traveling by sea. The third: That he Whoever hopes for forgiveness despite his insistence on sin. The fourth: That you are a person who prefers this world to the other. The fifth: Manipulating his religion, and following the permission of the sayings of the scholars. It was said: This is evidence of escaping from illness or imprisonment. And whoever dreams of performing tayammum in a place where there is no water, then he will be compensated for it, and it was Its expression is an expression of complete ablution, even if he is not able. And whoever dreams that he is performing tayammum, and water is present, which indicates his deviation from the law, then he should repent to God Almighty and return. It has been said that tayammum, which is healing, sustenance, Hajj, relief, and liberation, has been achieved. As for tayammum, it is Evidence of the meaning of ablution, but it is shorter than it. It symbolizes travel, illness, health and the health of the sick. As for dry ablution in the presence of water, it is evidence of falsehood. The translator said: Someone said: I saw that I was reciting poems during prayer. Another said: I was reading in foreign tongues, and he said: You become a translator and stand before God Almighty and speak the opposite of what you want. Another said: I saw that I was praying differently than before, so I said: Your sheikh orders you to do something. Otherwise, you think you are complying. Likewise, another person said to him: I told him: Your religion goes in the direction in which you prayed. Tayammum indicates what ablution indicates; Because it performs duties, performs deeds, and indicates travel. Because it is mainly used for travel, and a healthy person indicates his illness if he does not travel. Because it is permissible for a sick person to use it if he is unable to perform ablution, as I said for someone who prays sitting as a warning of illness, and tayammum indicates the patient’s well-being; Because fatigue is in his movements. Perform ablution frequently, and tayammum will go away, and if fatigue stops, sick fatigue will go away. Know the interpretation of tayammum in a dream - YouTube

Interpretation of Tayammum in a dream Jaafar Al-Sadiq said: Tayammum in a dream is the fulfillment of what is desired, which is healing, sustenance, Hajj, influence, and freedom. Tayammum in a dream indicates the proximity of the side. Tayammum is a sign of comfort near God Almighty. Tayammum in a dream is evidence of travel or a warning of an illness in which Tayammum is required. Perhaps it indicates the loss of water for the traveler because he performs Tayammum with sand or with something that does not stick to the hands. Tayammum indicates poverty after wealth and illness of health and well-being for the patient. Tayammum in the presence of water indicates error. If he sees that he is performing tayammum, even if there is no water, this indicates that he is almost weak, and the end of distress. If it is in the presence of water, then it has five sayings: Among them: that the dreamer prefers marriage to consummation. The second: that he is someone who prefers traveling by land to traveling by sea. The third: that he is someone who hopes for forgiveness while insisting on sinning. The fourth: that he is someone who prefers this world over the other. The fifth: playing with his religion, and following the permission of the scholars’ sayings. It was said: This is evidence of escaping from illness or imprisonment. And whoever dreams that he is performing tayammum in a place where there is no water, he compensates him, so his interpretation was an expression of complete ablution, even if he could not. And whoever dreams: that he is performing tayammum, and water is present, which indicates his deviation from the law, so let him repent to God Almighty and return. It was said that tayammum, which is healing, sustenance, pilgrimage, relief, and liberation has been achieved. As for tayammum, it is evidence of the meaning of ablution, except that it is shorter than it. It symbolizes travel, healthy illness, and the health of the sick. As for dry ablution in the presence of water, it is evidence of falsehood. The translator said: Someone said: I saw that I was reading poems in prayer. Another said: I was reading in foreign languages, so he said: You become a translator and stand before God Almighty and speak the opposite of what you want. Another said: I saw that I was praying in a way other than my own, so I said: Your sheikh is ordering you to do something. Otherwise, you think you are complying. Another said the same, I said to him: Your religion is going in the direction in which you prayed. Dry ablution indicates what ablution indicates; because it performs duties, and reduces actions, and indicates travel; because it is used primarily in travel, and for the healthy, it indicates his illness if he does not travel. Because it is permissible for the sick to use it if he is unable to perform ablution, as I said to the one who prayed while sitting, warning of illness, and dry ablution indicates the patient’s recovery; because the fatigue is in his movements. Frequent ablution, and dry ablution is removed from him, and if the fatigue stops, the illness fatigue is removed, so know that the interpretation of dry ablution in a dream - YouTube

title: Escaping from a camel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from a camel in a dream is not related. The dreams that a single woman sees in her dream have many repercussions, and we mention among the most important of them the following: When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is escaping from a camel, this is a sign of marriage soon. This dream may be a sign of a gift that she will receive or A dowry will be paid to her. An unmarried girl escaping from a camel shows the beauty of the girl and her frequent talk and persecutors in her life. Escaping from a camel in dreams for married people. The dream of escaping from camels also comes to a married woman in many circumstances, and some of them can be summarized as follows: A married woman sees a camel in a dream, as this indicates On the return of her estranged husband to her embrace. The dream of seeing a camel and escaping from it may indicate the patience that the married woman will face in her life. The dream also shows steadfastness in the face of the various problems that she faces in her life. And the ability to perform them safely. The dream of escaping from the camel indicates the ability of the married woman On raising her children and escaping with them from bad friends. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing animals in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Escaping from a camel in dreams for divorced women. Among the people who see a pregnancy in a dream and escape from it is a divorced woman, and it has many interpretations, which can be listed below: If a divorced woman dreams of a camel As she manages it, this is evidence of many family problems and separation. Seeing a camel in a dream in general indicates her patience in sitting without marriage and the burdens of life. While the dream may indicate the good condition of her children and their escape from the problems that surround them. A camel in a dream and fighting with it is a sign There are many haters and envious people around this woman. Escaping from a camel in a dream about a man and its importance. Seeing a camel in a dream for a man differs from a woman in its interpretation, and some of them can be seen as follows: If a man is seen riding a large camel, this indicates his marriage to a beautiful woman. Seeing a camel Differently than usual, it is a sign of marriage to a widow or divorced woman and emotional stability. A large camel in a man’s dream indicates the great good that he will obtain. This sustenance could be a lot of money or good offspring. The escape of a camel is evidence of a great dispute surrounding In the life of this man. Buying a camel in a dream indicates the acquisition of treasure or a lot of money without prior introductions. Running to many virtues in front of a man indicates that he will achieve many of the goals he seeks. And seeing a man in his dream that he is walking among a herd of camels means that he has arrived. To a great position in his professional life. When a man sees himself walking on the sand with camels, this indicates that there are many difficulties that he faces in order to achieve his dreams. Escaping from a camel in a dream for a pregnant woman and its interpretation, and a pregnant woman is one of the people who are interpreted as follows: Where A camel in a dream indicates family stability. It also indicates the return of a strange husband after a long time. A camel escaping in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates marital problems that she will face in her life. But this

title: Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream and its meaning in detail

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing bees in a dream and its meaning in detail. Bees are beneficial insects that benefit humans. They are responsible for producing white honey, which helps prevent and treat many diseases. Even a bee sting is useful because it helps in treating diseases. Seeing bees in a dream has many Of the interpretations and in this article we will explain the interpretation to you as soon as possible. Interpretation of seeing a beehive in a dream Seeing a beehive in a dream means hope and wealth, especially if it is full of bees. Seeing an empty beehive in a dream indicates problems, diseases and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life. A beehive full of honey It is a sign of prosperity and progress in business. Seeing a beehive can indicate a happy married life and joy, as it can be a sign of good luck. Whoever places a beehive in his hands, this dream shows a sign of success in his career. Interpretation of seeing bees for a single womanThis dream is for a single woman to see bees in a dream This indicates security and tranquility. Seeing bees in a dream for a single woman can be a sign of good health and can be a sign of marriage soon. For a student who sees bees in a dream, this dream is a sign of excellence, success, and pleasant skin. And seeing honey bees indicates this in a dream. However, her morals are good and her heart is kind. Interpretation of seeing bees for a married woman: A married woman seeing bees in a dream is an indication that she enjoys stability in her life, and seeing bees can be a sign of good and wonderful nutrition. Bees for a married woman can be a sign of pregnancy soon. There are those who Interpretation of seeing bees in a married woman’s dream as a sign of getting rid of problems and disagreements. If the woman is divorced, then seeing bees in her dream may mean that she will return to her husband. Interpretation of seeing bees for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees bees in a dream, then this dream indicates her safety and the safety of her fetus. It can Seeing bees in a dream is a sign that the baby is male and that God knows best. In general, seeing bees in a dream is a sign of goodness, happiness, and the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires. Interpretation of seeing the queen bee in a dream Seeing the queen bee in a dream is an omen of good luck and happiness for the dreamer. And seeing the queen is for a man or For an unmarried woman, it is a sign of a close marriage. Commentators unanimously agreed that seeing a queen bee in a dream is usually a sign of fulfilling a desire and obtaining a new job. The queen refers to the beautiful woman he marries, and it may be the great and noble glaucoma complexion that prevails in the dreamer. Interpretation Seeing a bee sting in a dream A bee sting in a dream indicates success, whether in the field of study or at work, and if someone proposes marriage and marries a girl, he will receive a proposal for acceptance. A bee sting for a pregnant woman is an invasion of the vulva and glaucoma. Therefore, we present to you all possible interpretations of seeing bees. In a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article and we will provide

title: Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive, either angry, smiling, or sick

preview.html: Learn about seeing a dead father in a dream from Ibn Sirin. See the common interpretations of seeing a dead father in a dream while he is angry and seeing a sick dead father in a dream or seeing a tired dead father in a dream and the meaning of the interpretation of seeing a dead father in a dream alive and happy. Seeing a dead father in a dreamSeeing a dead father In a dream while he is alive, it is interpreted according to his condition, whether he is happy, sad, or sick. Seeing a deceased father in a dream while he is smiling indicates his high status before God, and also shows God’s satisfaction with him. Also, seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive Life and smiling heralds the arrival of good news and indicates happiness, joy, food and success. Read also: Seeing a dead mother in a dream Seeing a dead father who is sick Seeing a dead father sick in a dream may mean that he committed a sin, or it may mean that he fell into debt before his death. The interpretation of the vision may indicate A dead father who is sick in a dream indicates his need to beg or give alms, and the dreamer must do so. title: Interpretation of seeing a ruler in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the ruler by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the ruler in a dream. Details of the money that the fortuneteller obtains, but after he gets tired. The sick person who sees the ruler in a dream is a sign of death due to the severity of the illness. But if one sees the protractor in a dream, this is evidence that he is looking at many things from an angle. Other. The ruler in the dream is evidence that the dreamer is meeting new friends. Interpretation of the dream of the Nabulsi governor. The interpretation of the ruler in the dream shows the dreamer’s awareness and ability to deal with things and take responsibility. Dreaming of a wooden ruler in a dream indicates the success of the emotional relationship in which the dreamer lives. Buying a ruler is a dream that indicates To the beginning of a new life. Interpretation of seeing a ruler for a single woman. Look at the single girl. Whoever studies the ruler in a dream is evidence of her transition to a new stage of study. A broken ruler indicates a serious illness. But if she sees in a dream that she is measuring it using a ruler, this indicates positive changes that are occurring. In her life. Buying one ruler is evidence of achieving goals and desires. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ruler for a married woman. If a married woman sees a new ruler in a dream, this means that she will move to a new house or get a new job. The presence of a beautiful-looking ruler in a married woman’s dream is a sign To progress towards a much better life. The school principal indicates the success and excellence that this woman achieves in her life. Interpretation of seeing a ruler for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of a lot of money and abundance of goodness. A new ruler in a dream is evidence of an easy and trouble-free birth. Interpretation of a dream Seeing a ruler for a man: Seeing a ruler in a man’s dream is evidence of the money he gets, which comes after fatigue and suffering. As for a dream about a ruler, broken in a dream is evidence of the negatives that the man suffers from in the dream. Buying a ruler in a dream is evidence of stability in marital life. Dreaming of selling a ruler means getting rid of Of problems and obstacles. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about failing exams

preview.html: Interpretation of failure in exams is one of the dreams in which many dreamers feel dissatisfaction because failure in exams is in fact a type of failure that causes a lot of negative feelings in the dreamer. We will try to identify some of the signs of failure in exams according to sheikhs and scholars from the most famous dream interpretations. An interpretation that we will mention for any vision we are talking about, for any vision that the dreamer dreams of, because the interpretation of the dream does not depend only on the details of the vision, but rather depends on many other details surrounding life. To the world that the interpreter must realize in principle.Read more: Toilet in a dreamInterpretation of failing an examInterpretation of seeing failure of an exam in a dreamInterpretation of seeing failure in an examSeeing failure in an exam is one of the visions that indicates the presence of some responsibilities that the dreamer is afraid to bear.Also, it may This vision indicates failures and losses that the dreamer will suffer. Also, seeing failure in an exam may indicate the loss of projects that the dreamer was planning. If the dreamer sees himself taking an exam, this may be a sign that he will get married soon – God willing. Likewise, The dreamer who sees himself on an exam board and cannot answer, this indicates that he does not fully trust himself. Read more: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing a dream about failing an individual exam An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is failing an exam, this indicates the failure of an emotional relationship. Also, seeing an unmarried girl failing exams in a dream may mean that there are some problems that the girl is suffering from with her partner. Seeing a failed exam in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees drawings in a dream during the examination may mean that she will suffer during childbirth, God forbid. Also Seeing a failed test in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that the fetus is in good condition and that it is complete, and God knows best. In addition to dreaming of not undergoing tests, this indicates that the pregnant woman may face some difficulties in giving birth, God forbid. Read more: Penguin in a dream Seeing a man Fails in the exam: The man who sees in a dream that he failed the exam, this may be evidence that he will experience failure, God forbid, and this dream could indicate that there are some problems that the man will suffer in life. Seeing failure in the exam in a dream from Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi says that Failing an exam is one of the visions that show the difficulties and problems that the dreamer faces. Failing exams, according to Al-Nabulsi, expresses fear during this period of the dreamer’s suffering. In addition, failing exams can be one of the indicators of fear of failure or inability. On achieving success. In general, seeing an exam in a dream and drawings, may be a sign that the dreamer cannot overcome the problems he faces. Read more: Washing a dead person Seeing crying during an exam in a single woman’s dream Failing exams is one of the dreams that causes anxiety and indicates confusion Which radiates

title: Interpretation of a dead person’s dream of giving chicken to a living person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dead person’s dream of giving chickens to a living person in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The dreams that people see in a dream are many, and interpreters have contributed to the interpretation of many visions and dreams in several ways, as the interpretation of dreams depends on the nature, shape, and details of the viewer’s dream, and some interpreters can do this. They differ in the interpretation of some dreams and visions, and the interpretation of a dream about a deceased person. Giving chicken to a living person in a dream is considered one of the dreams that have many signs and signals related to the dreamer and the dreamer’s body. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person giving chickens to a living person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. People see in a dream many visions that can cause anxiety. Confusion or elation. The interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving chickens to live in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the dreams that indicates many signs and signals that are represented by each of the following indicators, as follows: The interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin in a dream about giving a dead person chickens to live in a dream indicates that the dreamer He will obtain great goodness. Because this goodness makes him live a life of luxury and great bliss. And if he gives the dead person food and that food is bad, then this is a sign of illicit money. In addition, if someone dreams that a dead person gave him watermelon in a dream, then this is a sign On sadness and worry about him. Then, seeing the monarch rejecting the dead person’s food indicates rejection of the good that comes to him. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a hookah in a dream for an unmarried and divorced woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving a chicken to a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman sees many visions and dreams in a dream. Which indicate multiple signs and clues, and the interpretation of a dead person’s dream of giving chickens to live in a dream by Ibn Sirin about a pregnant woman is one of the visions that have been put forward. It has been interpreted in several ways, and the most important indicators for this are the interpretation of a dream about a dead man giving chicken to a pregnant woman and each of the following signs: A pregnant wife seeing a dead man in a dream while he is alive and not dead shows the dead man’s great status with his Lord. But when a pregnant woman sees him dead or sick Or a weak or old woman in a dream, this indicates her disobedience. In addition to the lack of charity given to the dead and the lack of supplication for him, it is an indication of asking for supplication and zakat. If a pregnant woman sees that she has fed a dead person, this indicates constant supplication for him. In addition, it could be A reference to the alms that you give to the soul of the deceased. However, if a pregnant woman sees that the deceased is feeding her food that is not edible, this indicates money that is not permissible. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a child in your arms for the single and the married according to Ibn Sirin and the leading translators. Seeing a dead chicken in a dream for a married woman. There are many dreams that A married woman sees her in a dream. These dreams she sees may transport people to her and may cause anxiety for her, as the interpretation of a dream about dead people gives chickens to live in one of their dreams. It has many connotations, as seeing a deceased chicken in a dream for a married woman is interpreted in several ways

title: Interpretation of seeing madness in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing madness in a dream is one of the dreams that has many connotations that vary according to the dream scene, such as seeing a relative of her madness, or a wife seeing madness in a dream, or seeing a mad father in a dream. We will refer it to any other vision because the interpretation of the dream is not due to the similarity between the visions, but each vision has its own way of interpretation, which depends not only on the details of the vision, but also on the circumstances of the dreamer, which the interpreter must recognize from the beginning. Read also: The toilet In a dream, the interpretation of seeing madness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing madness in a dream. Madness in a dream, as Ibn Sirin says, indicates that the dreamer is blessed with wealth or a high status among those around him. Ibn Sirin also says that the dreamer who sees in a dream that he has gone mad may indicate that the dreamer is blessed with wealth or a high status among those around him. Ibn Sirin also says that the dreamer who sees in a dream that he has gone mad may indicate The happiness and joy that the dreamer feels, and God knows best. Moreover, Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of madness generally means losing money, just as a woman who sees soldiers in a dream indicates a lot of sustenance, and God knows best. Seeing madness in a dream of a single woman, an unmarried girl who Dreaming that she is going crazy indicates that this girl is from a wealthy family. Like an unmarried girl who saw herself crazy, this may indicate her involvement. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Seeing madness in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in a dream that she has become crazy, it may be This is a sign of humanity improving its situation - God willing. Just like a married woman who sees in her dream that she has become mad, this may be a sign that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing madness in a dream for a pregnant womanA pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she has become mad, This person could have an easy delivery - God willing. Just like a pregnant woman who sees madness in a dream, this also adjusts her purchases for easy delivery - God willing - that she will enjoy. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing madness in a dream for a manThe man who sees Paranoia in a dream. This may be a sign of humanity reaching power, and God knows best. Like someone who sees in his dream madness through touch, this indicates that this person consumes usury, and God knows best. Also, madness in a person’s dream may be from humans that he will enter Heaven, and God knows best. As for seeing a crazy boy in a dream, this may be evidence that this boy and his father are rich. Seeing a crazy relative in a dream When you see a crazy relative in a dream, this may indicate secret situations or happy news that the dreamer will receive, and God knows best. Also, seeing A dream about a family member going crazy, this may mean that there is some money that the dreamer will get, and God knows best. As for seeing the father going crazy in a dream, this may indicate the anxiety and fear that the dreamer will feel in the future, and this vision may indicate problems and crises that he is suffering from. Among them is the dreamer, and God knows best. Read also: Washing the dead
